1484290.name: Ambient Channels: Dreamscapes - Christmas in Victoria
1484290.description:
Welcome to Christmas in Victoria, a Dreamscapes episode depicting stylized Victoria in the early 1900s during Christmas. Visit the streets of Victoria replete with snow and enjoy the Hidden Objects game of finding Christmas trees and presents throughout the streets. (You can also turn off the Christmas effects and enjoy just the winter ambiance)

This episode is part of Ambient Channels Collector's Pass 2020-2021
1484290.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
